Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Halsted. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses will continue to operate from Adams/Wabash to Ashland in both directions and will conclude at 01:45 p.m.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
